title: FS: 1888 E273 G & B Chewing Gum President Cleveland
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 E273 G & B Chewing Gum President Cleveland
posts.post_content:
For the G&B collector, an opportunity to own a very rare President Cleveland Looking Left.  PSA graded Authentic, the image on this card is beautiful (I apologize for the scan, it a much more clear image in hand), with the back being as clean as the front.  One of two graded by PSA, while SGC show only two Cleveland cards graded, without reference to which of the three poses they are.  A truly scarce card, I am looking for [STRIKE]$500 obo[/STRIKE] PENDING on this card.  Price is  net  to me, I  accept PP friends and family, or for  Regular PP please add 3%  to  cover fees. Card will  ship upon   receipt of cleared payment.   Shipping is included.  Thanks for looking.

First firm commitment to buy, via PM, e-mail, or post here will trump negotiations.  Please feel free to make offers.

Hello from the Non-Sport side:

Please email me at [url]martykrim@gmail.com[/url] as I have a couple of questions regarding this card..

All the best,

Marty

Hi Marty,

I sent you an e-mail.

Ed
